entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 09:30 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: SW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with a few flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023
